transcript:
Customer: Raghunandan Raghav Ram Hare Siya
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ya very good afternoon Deepak Bhiman ji baat kar raha.
Customer: Bolie.
Executive: Ji mai Shiv Mishra baat kar raha hu India Mart assistant manager.
Executive: Aapke catalog quality score ke related mujhe call kiya gaya isme aapka product ka photo aur specification price nahi show ho raha aap is bare me aware hai ki nahi?
Customer: Deepak ji.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Jaise aapne conveyer belt ka dala hai na product.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To isme isliye aapko isliye nahi show ho raha na koi image hai to ye bataiye buyer kaise aapke catalog ko view karenge aur kya cheez dekh ke aapko query dalenge to isse aapko problem bhi to face ho raha hoga.
Executive: Call aate ki nahi aapko?
Customer: Nahi wo to aap log daloge na ya hum dalenge.
Executive: Wo to aap log daloge na.
Executive: Dekhiye wo dono side se rehta hai.
Executive: Nahi to mai usi ke guide ke liye aapko call kiya hu samajh rahe hai aap to isme jaise dekhiye aapke jo product aap price batayenge to wahi price to mai add karunga khud se to mai kar nahi sakta ki is product ka kya price aapka sequence hai product ka kya image clarity hona chahiye jo aap mujhe guide karte jayenge usi ke liye aapko wo cheeze update karwani padegi aur aap usme khud participate karenge chezo ko samajh payenge tabhi hisab se wo ho payega to ye sab image hai aapke pass ki nahi jo jo yaha pe product aapke missing aa rahe hai to bataiye to mai karwa dunga aapko.
Customer: To whatsapp pe connect karo aap mujhe fir whatsapp pe dekh.
Executive: Whatsapp pe ha whatsapp pe aap connect bhi ho sakte hai aapka mai ek BC bhi karwa dunga aap video call pe bhi aa jayenge waha se proper aapko update kar diya jayega.
Executive: Whatsapp pe mai hi likh ke reply kar raha hu aapke pass wo main jo chart hai na payment ka pura apna price hisab.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Nahi price fix fix price nahi hota kuch bhi.
Executive: To ek range apne hisab se bata dijiye taki buyer aapko connect kare to ek range to aapko idea lag hi gaya hoga itne samay se aap jude bhi hai right.
Executive: To wahi cheez aap mujhe update karte jayenge ho jayega to mai aapko.
Customer: Chalo aap mujhe whatsapp pe bhejo aapko kya kya chahiye mai aapko whatsapp pe bhejta hu.
Executive: Koi na mai aapko update kar raha hu aur usi pe mai video ka aapko update kar dunga okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Product photo and price not showing.

- Customer asks who will upload the details.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process of updating details.

- Executive offered to connect on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, product details, whatsapp, price
